timeline.bodyText:
We do not use assert, it need to be enabled by a command line switch, which rarely is used. You can do a if(...) { throw new IllegalArgumentException("<message>"); } instead.
I personally like programing by contract, so feel free to promote this to become part of the coding guidelines, but until then we should not use it.
